quest.name: The Truth Hurts
journal: Jeryk may come to regret his next decision.

dialogue.name: MAGNUS
dialogue.text: I thought I told you to leave!

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, but I think it'd be for the best if you just forgot about the Talos.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: What could be so terrible he'd want to keep it from us?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I hope Jeryk doesn't get in trouble for telling us what happened.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Though the Talos yet wants for a beating heart, it would appear thine efforts were not for naught.

dialogue.name: JERYK
dialogue.text: Right, then. The Talos...their hearts cannot be made of just any stone. You need a special sort with sufficient aetherial conductivity. Both it and the other materials used in the construction of Talos bodies are mined in the same place...

dialogue.name: JERYK
dialogue.text: That place, of course, being here. The Hills of Amber...

dialogue.name: JERYK
dialogue.text: And it was three years ago when...when she...

dialogue.name: JERYK
dialogue.text: No, no I can't. I'm sorry, but you'll have to hear it from Thaffe or someone else.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: <sigh> Back to the tavern, then.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: You don't suppose Thaffe is going to run off too, do you?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: This is all my fault. I never should have pressured him.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: What terrible tragedy befell him years ago, I wonder...

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: Still here, eh? You can ask again, but the answer's the same. Our trolleys areâ”€

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: What!? Godsdammit Jeryk. You could've at least finished so I wouldn't have to clean up your mess.

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: Seeing how you made such quick progress in fixing that Talos and all, he was probably thinking you could help change things around here.

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: And I think he may be right... Gather your friends, and I'll tell you what you want to know.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Why must he always treat me like this...

dialogue.name: MAGNUS
dialogue.text: If not for those damned Talos, she'd...she'd...

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: I wish there was more we could do for you, I truly do. But after Agna's accident, no one is allowed near those mines.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Full well do I know the pain of loss and how heavily it can weigh on one's heart. Nevertheless, there is but one way forward.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: We must needs procure a new heart for the Talos.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Thaffe. Knowest thou any location wherein we might find the stone we require? No matter how scant the possibility, we would seize it.

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: I told you near all of the veins were tapped dry years ago. ...Though I suppose, if you really wanted to try, you may find something at Nuvy's Leavings.

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: It was opened well before Talos became commonplace, which is why the mining there was never quite as deep.

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: When you get there, look for Guthjon and tell him I sent you. But don't be surprised if he tells you the same thing.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Thine assistance is most appreciated.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Forename. I think it best Thancred join thee in this search.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Though he wouldst be quick to deny it, his heart is in turmoil, and his thoughts clouded.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: 'Twould be unwise to ignore his distress.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: I prithee attend Thancred and keep him occupied with the task at hand.

dialogue.name: THAFFE
dialogue.text: Guthjon has worked in these mines longer than near anyone I know. You'd do well to heed his advice in there.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Off to somewhere, are you?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: At last, a lead on the stone we need to power the Talos.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I can't very well have you go on your own. Lead the way.
